Sammy Sheik (Arabic; a mụrụ na Nọvemba 15, 1981) bụ onye Egypt-American na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara Sheik nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ "Mustafa" na Clint Eastwoodz American Sniper
A họpụtara Sheik ka ọ bụrụ onye isi Al Jazeera, Mukhtar Al-Mujib na ihe nkiri Maazị Brooks, Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na usoro TV
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-egbu egbu, Mohamed El-Razani na usoro FX, Over There, onye ndú mgbanaka, Masheer Abu Marzuq na Fox's 24, nke dugara na ọrụ Jamal Bin Mohamed na 24's spinoff show The Rookie
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye Bedouin nwere ọbara ọkụ, Kamal na ABC's Lost, ma mee ka ndị ọbịa pụta na NCIS, The Unit, My Own Worst Enemy na In the Moment
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro Hany na Showtime's United States of Tara
Sheik na-eke oge ya n'etiti Cairo na Los Angeles.
